00034 void RainbruRPG::Gui::GuiManager::init(){
00035   LOGI("Initializing GuiManager...");
00036   this->transitionTime=600;
00037   guiFadeInTime=1000;
00038   guiOpacity=0.7f;
00039   inGuiFadeIn=false;
00040   inGuiFadeOut=false;
00041   velocity=new vcConstant();
00042 }

00049 void RainbruRPG::Gui::GuiManager::cleanup(){
00050   LOGI("Cleaning up GuiManager...");
00051 
00052   if (velocity)
00053     delete velocity;
00054 
00055   velocity=NULL;
00056 
00057 }

00067 void RainbruRPG::Gui::GuiManager::
00068 createNumDebugWindow(Ogre::RenderWindow* win){
00069   this->win=win;
00070   LOGI("Creating Numeric Debug Window...");
00071 
00072   Ogre::Overlay* mPanelOverlay=NULL;
00073 
00074   mPanelOverlay =OverlayManager::getSingleton().
00075     getByName("RainbruRPG/NumericDebug");
00076 
00077   if (mPanelOverlay)
00078     mPanelOverlay->show();
00079   else
00080     LOGE("Cannot load RainbruRPG/NumericDebug");
00081 
00082 }

00088 void RainbruRPG::Gui::GuiManager::createTitleOverlay(Ogre::RenderWindow* win){
00089   this->win=win;
00090   LOGI("Creating Title overlay...");
00091 
00092   mTitleOverlay=NULL;
00093 
00094   mTitleOverlay =OverlayManager::getSingleton().
00095     getByName("RainbruRPG/Title");
00096 
00097   if (mTitleOverlay){
00098     mTitleOverlay->show();
00099 
00100     Ogre::String s;
00101     s="v";
00102     s+=VERSION;
00103     s+="-";
00104     s+=BUILD_RELEASE;
00105 
00106     OverlayElement* ver=mTitleOverlay->getChild("RainbruRPG/Title/Panel")
00107       ->getChild("RainbruRPG/Title/Version");
00108     ver->setParameter( "caption", s );
00109   }
00110   else{
00111     LOGE("Cannot load RainbruRPG/Title");
00112   }
00113 }

00123 void RainbruRPG::Gui::GuiManager::showFPS(){
00124   static String currFps = "Current FPS: ";
00125   static String avgFps = "Average FPS: ";
00126   static String bestFps = "Best FPS: ";
00127   static String worstFps = "Worst FPS: ";
00128   static String tris = "Triangle Count: ";
00129   
00130   // update stats when necessary
00131     try {
00132     OverlayElement* guiAvg = OverlayManager::getSingleton().
00133       getOverlayElement("RainbruRPG/NumericDebug/AverageFps");
00134 
00135     OverlayElement* guiCurr = OverlayManager::getSingleton().
00136       getOverlayElement("RainbruRPG/NumericDebug/CurrFps");
00137 
00138     OverlayElement* guiBest = OverlayManager::getSingleton().
00139       getOverlayElement("RainbruRPG/NumericDebug/BestFps");
00140 
00141     OverlayElement* guiWorst = OverlayManager::getSingleton().
00142       getOverlayElement("RainbruRPG/NumericDebug/WorstFps");
00143     
00144     const RenderTarget::FrameStats& stats = win->getStatistics();
00145     
00146     guiAvg->setCaption(avgFps + StringConverter::toString((int)stats.avgFPS));
00147     guiCurr->setCaption(currFps + StringConverter::toString((int)stats.lastFPS));
00148     guiBest->setCaption(bestFps + StringConverter::toString((int)stats.bestFPS)
00149                         +" "+StringConverter::toString(stats.bestFrameTime)
00150                         +" ms");
00151 
00152     guiWorst->setCaption(worstFps + StringConverter::toString((int)stats.worstFPS)
00153                          +" "+StringConverter::toString(stats.worstFrameTime)
00154                          +" ms");
00155     
00156     OverlayElement* guiTris = OverlayManager::getSingleton().
00157       getOverlayElement("RainbruRPG/NumericDebug/NumTris");
00158 
00159     guiTris->setCaption(tris + StringConverter::toString(stats.triangleCount));
00160     
00161     OverlayElement* guiDbg = OverlayManager::getSingleton().
00162       getOverlayElement("RainbruRPG/NumericDebug/DebugText");
00163 
00164     //  guiDbg->setCaption(win->getDebugText());
00165     guiDbg->setCaption("DebugText");
00166 
00167   }
00168   catch(...)
00169     {
00170       LOGE("Cannot update numeriocDebugWindow");
00171     }
00172 
00173 }

00183 void RainbruRPG::Gui::GuiManager::loadCEGUILayout(const char* layoutName){
00184   LOGI("Loading a CEGUI layout");
00185   LOGCATS("Layout name :'");
00186   LOGCATS(layoutName);
00187   LOGCATS("'");
00188   LOGCAT();
00189 
00190   CEGUI::Window* mEditorGuiSheet = CEGUI::WindowManager::getSingleton().
00191     loadWindowLayout((CEGUI::utf8*)layoutName);
00192 
00193   if (!mEditorGuiSheet){
00194     LOGW("Failed to load the CEGUI layout");
00195   }
00196 
00197   GameEngine::getSingleton().getCEGUISystem()->setGUISheet(mEditorGuiSheet);
00198   setGuiTransparency(0.0f);
00199 
00200   LOGI("Debugging CEGUI GUISheet");
00201   CEGUI::Window* deb=GameEngine::getSingleton().getCEGUISystem()
00202     ->getGUISheet();
00203 
00204   debugWindow(deb);
00205 
00206   if (deb->getChildCount()>0){
00207     LOGI("Debugging active child");
00208     debugWindow(deb->getActiveChild());
00209   }
00210 }

00217 Ogre::RenderWindow* RainbruRPG::Gui::GuiManager::getRenderWindow(){
00218   if (!win){
00219     LOGE("Returning a NULL Ogre render window");
00220     return NULL;
00221   }
00222   else{
00223     return this->win;
00224   }
00225 }

00250 void RainbruRPG::Gui::GuiManager::setGuiTransparency(float f){

00257 void RainbruRPG::Gui::GuiManager::beginGuiFadeIn(){
00258   LOGI("Gui fadeIn is beginning");
00259   inGuiFadeIn=true;
00260   velocity->setTranslationLenght(guiOpacity);
00261   velocity->setTransitionTime(guiFadeInTime);
00262   velocity->start();
00263 }
00264 
00270 void RainbruRPG::Gui::GuiManager::guiFade(){
00271   if (inGuiFadeIn){
00272     increaseGuiTransparency(velocity->getNextFrame(inGuiFadeIn));
00273     if (!inGuiFadeIn){
00274       LOGI("FadeIn ended");
00275       LOGCATS("gui opacity set to :");
00276       LOGCATF(guiOpacity);
00277       LOGCAT();
00278       setGuiTransparency(guiOpacity);
00279     }
00280   }
00281 
00282   else if (inGuiFadeOut){
00283     increaseGuiTransparency(velocity->getNextFrame(inGuiFadeOut));
00284     if (!inGuiFadeOut){
00285       LOGI("FadeOut ended");
00286       LOGCATS("gui opacity set to :");
00287       LOGCATF(guiOpacity);
00288       LOGCAT();
00289       setGuiTransparency(0.0f);
00290     }
00291   }
00292 }
00293 
00299 void RainbruRPG::Gui::GuiManager::increaseGuiTransparency(float f){
00300   float t;
00301   t=GameEngine::getSingleton().getCEGUISystem()->getGUISheet()->getAlpha();
00302   setGuiTransparency(t+f);
00303 }

00308 void RainbruRPG::Gui::GuiManager::beginGuiFadeOut(){
00309   LOGI("Gui fadeOut is beginning");
00310   inGuiFadeOut=true;
00311 
00312   velocity->setTranslationLenght(0.0f-guiOpacity);
00313   velocity->setTransitionTime(guiFadeInTime);
00314   velocity->start();
00315 }

00322 
00323   CEGUI::WindowManager::getSingleton().destroyAllWindows();

00325 }

00352 void RainbruRPG::Gui::GuiManager::debugWindow(CEGUI::Window* win){
00353   if (!win){
00354     LOGW("Cannot debug NULL window");
00355   }
00356   else{
00357     LOGCATS("GUISheet name :'");
00358     LOGCATS(win->getName().c_str());
00359     LOGCATS("'");
00360     LOGCAT();
00361     
00362     LOGCATS("GUISheet type :'");
00363     LOGCATS(win->getType().c_str());
00364     LOGCATS("'");
00365     LOGCAT();
00366     
00367     LOGCATS("GUISheet text :'");
00368     LOGCATS(win->getText().c_str());
00369     LOGCATS("'");
00370     LOGCAT();
00371     
00372     LOGCATS("Is visible ? :'");
00373     LOGCATB(win->isVisible());
00374     LOGCATS("'");
00375     LOGCAT();
00376     
00377     LOGCATS("Is disabled ? :'");
00378     LOGCATB(win->isDisabled());
00379     LOGCATS("'");
00380     LOGCAT();
00381 
00382     LOGCATS("Is active ? :'");
00383     LOGCATB(win->isActive());
00384     LOGCATS("'");
00385     LOGCAT();
00386     
00387     LOGCATS("Contains ");
00388     LOGCATI(win->getChildCount());
00389     LOGCATS(" child(s)");
00390     LOGCAT();
00391   }
00392 }

00397 void RainbruRPG::Gui::GuiManager::debugChild(const char* name){
00398   CEGUI::Window* win=GameEngine::getSingleton().getCEGUISystem()
00399     ->getGUISheet()->getChild(name);
00400 
00401   debugWindow(win);
00402 }
